Key Match Events: Tasos Bakasetas scored an early second-half goal from outside the box
Post-Match Reflections: The Greek players fell to their knees at the full time whistle, others embraced their teammates with long hugs
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was an emotional night for the hosts, paying tribute to the late George Baldock
Others: Ireland conceded goals early into the second half, a familiar failing for them
